channel.title: Treasure Valley Vintage Computer Club
channel.description: Recent content on Treasure Valley Vintage Computer Club

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Welcome to the initial version of our website! Our goal was to seek inspiration both from some of the vintage computers and interfaces from which our club takes its name, but also from some of the previous publications which made this hobby such a community focused one in the past.
item.content: Welcome to the initial version of our website! Our goal was to seek inspiration both from some of the vintage computers and interfaces from which our club takes its name, but also from some of the previous publications which made this hobby such a community focused one in the past.

item.title: About TVVCC
item.description:
The Treasure Valley Vintage Computer Club is a Boise, ID based collective of vintage computing enthusiasts. Founded in 2025, the TVVCC meets every second Wednesday at 6:00 PM in the BSU Computer Science department in downtown Boise. Our loose mission involves sharing projects, getting help with your vintage treasures, and buying and selling your misfit computers.

Membership is free and open to the public, so feel free to join our Discord and drop us a line!
item.content:
The Treasure Valley Vintage Computer Club is a Boise, ID based collective of vintage computing enthusiasts. Founded in 2025, the TVVCC meets every second Wednesday at 6:00 PM in the BSU Computer Science department in downtown Boise. Our loose mission involves sharing projects, getting help with your vintage treasures, and buying and selling your misfit computers.

Membership is free and open to the public, so feel free to join our Discord and drop us a line!
